p: The main sources of DHA are flyingfish, herring, pollock and salmon roe (27.9%, 22.6%, 22.2%, and 17.4% of total lipids, respectively) [ 59], Cirrhinus mrigata (18.07 g/100 g muscle tissue FAs), and Catla catla (17.98 g/100 g muscle tissue FAs) [ 58]. The presence of this acid in the jackalberry (4.65 g FA per 100 g oil Diospyros mespiliformis) is noteworthy [ 139].
